data.prompt:
Extract comprehensive customer insights from reviews about Four Way Multi-Location Control Switches.
The output format is JSON in English:
{
"phy": {
"<PHYSICAL>": {
"<PID>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": [ID, …]
}
}
},
"perf": {
"<PERF>": {
"<perf_id>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": {<PERF_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
},
"use": {
"<USE>": {
"<SENT>": {<USE_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
}

Definitions:
- <PID>: Unique ID for physical aspect ("phy"), starting from A. After Z, continue with AA, AB, and so on.
- <PHYSICAL>: Components or inherent physical properties of the Four Way Multi-Location Control Switches without external interaction (e.g. dimensions, appearance, material type...)
- <DETAIL>: A self-contained detail summarized from the reviews.
- <SENT>: Sentiment polarity of the current <DETAIL> (- for negative, + for positive).
- ID: All review IDs mentioning the <DETAIL>
- <perf_id>: Unique ID for performance or functions ("perf"), starting from a. After z, continue with aa, ab, and so on.
- <PERF>: The Four Way Multi-Location Control Switches' performance (e.g. flexibility, durability, ...) or behaviors under various conditions (e.g. temperature, force, chemicals...) without reference to any specific use case
- <PERF_REASON>: <PID> of the <PHYSICAL> explicitly mentioned as the cause of the <PERF>. Include all mentioned <PID>s. If no reason is mentioned, use "?". <PERF_REASON> and <PERF> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together (i.e. the same review ID are included at both locations)
- <USE>: The specific application, applicable object, method, tool, or environment for the product.
- <USE_REASON>: <perf_id> or <PID> causing the <USE>'s sentiment. Include all mentioned reasons, or "?" if none can be inferred. <USE_REASON> and <USE> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- <PHYSICAL>/<PERF> and <DETAIL> MUST NOT include:
  * Generic statements without details (e.g., "good", "bad quality")
  * Issues unrelated to the product itself (e.g., "fast shipping", "delivery time")
- If a review mentions any physical aspect, related performance, or use together, extract them as separate entries under "phy," "perf," and "use," with no overlap.
- Make sure each <DETAIL> is under the most relevant <PHYSICAL> or <PERF> in the context of Four Way Multi-Location Control Switches
- Preserve negations

Key Instructions:
- Break down reviews with multiple aspects, performances, or uses into individual entries.
- Escape special characters with backslash that could cause JSON syntax errors.
- Include only explicitly mentioned reasons, and use "?" where no reason is mentioned.

Final Checklist:
- Go through all reviews and ensure that no aspect, performance, use, or reason is omitted, even if only mentioned once.
- Review all entries to ensure proper separation between aspects, performances, and uses.

Print the JSON result only.
Input format:
<ID>#<review>

[[INPUT]]
0#nice product. exact replacement
1#as designed works great. I usually pick these up at HD but was without a vehicle for several days - Very convenient to the door order.
2#Switch today. great switch, works as advertised, quality product
3#Stopped working properly. Stopped working properly after a couple months. Have to flick the switch multiple times to turn light on/off
4#Functions as expected. Great purchase. Cannot believe i was able to obtain this for $5.26 on sale. Functions as you would expect.
5#Its a switch, so there isn't much to say ... Its a switch, so there isn't much to say about it. However, the one that we received does not toggle as smoothly as we expected so I knocked off a couple of stars for that.
6#No Surprises. Local big box only carries 4-way switches in "Heavy Duty", which have a wider switch paddle that lacks the small border around the switch itself. I found this distracting, so I ordered this as a replacement. Looks much more like the other switches, so I'm quite satisfied.
7#Five Stars. Works fine.
8#Four Stars. Just what I needed
9#Great multi switch. It is hard to get excited about a light switch but this one I did. I have upstairs hall lights that are controlled by four switches. We repainted the house and the old switch was filthy from years of dirty hands and I decided to replace it- bad idea. I pulled the switch and went to the local hardware store and got switches that looked like it but the lights were no longer controlled by all the switches. I finally found this one on amazon and it has worked perfectly. It is easy to install especially if you are replacing a switch that was already there.
10#4-Way Switch. Good product. Good quality.
11#Five Stars. Worked perfectly. No issues.
12#Good Product, Received Quickly. I received the switch in the mail very quickly, installed it and it works just fine.
13#Four Stars. Couldn't find the switch I needed at the big chain stores. Amazon to the rescue.
14#Works great and much cheaper than our local big box. This switch works great and was much cheaper than our local big box. note: It is a little wider than the typical standard switch.
15#4-way toggle switch. has all the terminals, meets CSA, even has a ground screw. This is a white toggle, the body is ivory, but you won't see that with cover plate on.
16#Beats the big-box stores. Product was brand new and genuine brand name. Saved $5 each over the big box store. They are installed and working great.
17#Works great! Easy to put on and works 100% fine no issues at all. Will buy more for the other bedrooms in this house.
18#Great value. This item is a great value. Item was as advertised. It was shipped and received very quickly. i would order it again if I needed another.
19#Good quality. Satisfied with the quality.
20#May take sometime. Good product. Poor delivery.
